English: Three Commentaries on the Spring and Autumn Annals `春秋~[Chun1 qiu1], including Mr Gongyang's annals `公羊傳~|`公羊~传[Gong1 yang2 Zhuan4], Mr Guliang's annals `穀梁傳~|`谷~`梁~传[Gu3 liang2 Zhuan4] and Mr Zuo's annals or Zuo Zhuan `左傳~|`左~传[Zuo3 Zhuan4]

Three Commentaries on the Spring and Autumn Annals `春秋~[Chun1 qiu1], including Mr Gongyang's annals `公羊傳~|`公羊~传[Gong1 yang2 Zhuan4], Mr Guliang's annals `穀梁傳~|`谷~`梁~传[Gu3 liang2 Zhuan4] and Mr Zuo's annals or Zuo Zhuan `左傳~|`左~传[Zuo3 Zhuan4]
